subtitleNullable: Self updating dataset - ALJAZEERA News RSS Feeds
descriptionNullable:
isnpired by this dataset: [BBC NEWS ](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/gpreda/bbc-news)

### **Context**

Self updating dataset. It collects RSS Feeds from ALJAZEERA News using a Kernel: [https://www.kaggle.com/code/anassmellouki1/aljazeera-news-rss-feeds](https://www.kaggle.com/code/anassmellouki1/aljazeera-news-rss-feeds).
The Kernel is run with a fixed frequency and the dataset is updated using the output of the Notebook.

### **Content**

ALJAZEERA News RSS Feeds. The data contains the following columns:

#### title
#### pubDate
#### guid
#### link
#### description

### **Collection method**
**Uses requests_html and BeautifulSoup to collect RSS Feeds from ALJAZEERA News site.

### **Acknowledgements**
The content is proprietary of ALJAZEERA

### **Inspiration**
Use the data to analyze the sentiment of news, from title and description
